fields.name: AsyncExecution
fields.description: Optional. If set to true, provisioning will complete as soon as the script starts and will not wait for script to complete.

fields.name: ErrorBlobManagedIdentity
fields.description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to errorBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

fields.name: ErrorBlobUri
fields.description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script error stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer errorBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

fields.name: InstanceView
fields.description: The virtual machine run command instance view.

fields.name: OutputBlobManagedIdentity
fields.description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to outputBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

fields.name: OutputBlobUri
fields.description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script output stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer outputBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

fields.name: Parameters
fields.description: The parameters used by the script.

fields.name: ProtectedParameters
fields.description: The parameters used by the script.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response. If treatFailureAsDeploymentFailure set to true, any failure in the script will fail the deployment and ProvisioningState will be marked as Failed. If treatFailureAsDeploymentFailure set to false, ProvisioningState would only reflect whether the run command was run or not by the extensions platform, it would not indicate whether script failed in case of script failures. See instance view of run command in case of script failures to see executionMessage, output, error: https://aka.ms/runcommandmanaged#get-execution-status-and-results

fields.name: RunAsPassword
fields.description: Specifies the user account password on the VM when executing the run command.

fields.name: RunAsUser
fields.description: Specifies the user account on the VM when executing the run command.

fields.name: Source
fields.description: The source of the run command script.

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The timeout in seconds to execute the run command.

fields.name: TreatFailureAsDeploymentFailure
fields.description: Optional. If set to true, any failure in the script will fail the deployment and ProvisioningState will be marked as Failed. If set to false, ProvisioningState would only reflect whether the run command was run or not by the extensions platform, it would not indicate whether script failed in case of script failures. See instance view of run command in case of script failures to see executionMessage, output, error: https://aka.ms/runcommandmanaged#get-execution-status-and-results
